verses.verse: וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> wə·yā·ṣā will spring up ( The Root of Jesse) חֹ֖טֶר <WH2415> ḥō·ṭer Then a shoot מִגֵּ֣זַע <WH1503> mig·gê·za‘ from the stump יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> yi·šāy of Jesse, וְנֵ֖צֶר <WH5342> wə·nê·ṣer and a Branch מִשָּׁרָשָׁ֥יו <WH8328> miš·šā·rā·šāw from his roots יִפְרֶֽה׃ <WH6509> yip̄·reh will bear fruit.

וַהֲרִיח֖וֹ <WH7306> wa·hă·rî·ḥōw And He will delight בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> bə·yir·’aṯ in the fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD. וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- He will not לְמַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> lə·mar·’êh see, עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw by what His eyes יִשְׁפּ֔וֹט <WH8199> yiš·pō·wṭ judge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- and He will not לְמִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH4926> lə·miš·ma‘ hear, אָזְנָ֖יו <WH241> ’ā·zə·nāw by what His ears יוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <WH3198> yō·w·ḵî·aḥ decide

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> wə·hā·yāh - בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha·hū On that שֹׁ֣רֶשׁ <WH8328> šō·reš the Root יִשַׁ֗י <WH3448> yi·šay of Jesse אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עֹמֵד֙ <WH5975> ‘ō·mêḏ will stand לְנֵ֣ס <WH5251> lə·nês as a banner עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm for the peoples. אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw ... גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> gō·w·yim The nations יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <WH1875> yiḏ·rō·šū will seek Him, ( LXX On that day the Root of Jesse will appear, One who will arise to rule over the Gentiles; in Him the Gentiles will put their hope; cited in .) וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> wə·hā·yə·ṯāh ... מְנֻחָת֖וֹ <WH4496> mə·nu·ḥā·ṯōw and His place of rest כָּבֽוֹד׃פ <WH3519> kā·ḇō·wḏ will be glorious.
